title: The Stuff of Legend, Omnibus One
description: This hardcover collection brings together the first two volumes of the New York Times bestselling graphic novel THE STUFF OF LEGEND, The Dark and The Jungle, in one beautiful 272 page edition.As Allied forces fight the enemy on Europe's war-torn beaches, another battle begins in a child's bedroom in Brooklyn when the nightmarish Boogeyman snatches a boy and takes him to the realm of The Dark. The child's playthings, led by the toy soldier known as the Colonel, band together to stage a daring rescue. On their perilous mission they will confront the boy's bitter and forgotten toys, as well as betrayal in their own ranks. The Stuff of Legend is a haunting and ultimately redemptive tale of loyalty, camaraderie, and perseverance.
author: Mike Raicht
